title: South Korea-Based KB Financial's 3Q Net Profit Fell 1.4%
text:
By Kwanwoo Jun

South Korea-based KB Financial Group Inc.'s (105560.SE) third-quarter net profit fell 1.4% on year, partly due to a one-off cost for severance payments.

Net profit for the quarter ended September was 940.69 billion Korean won ($803.5 million), compared with KRW953.97 billion in the same quarter a year earlier, the South Korean banking giant said Thursday.

Third-quarter net profit beat the FactSet consensus forecast for net profit of KRW912.66 billion.

Revenue rose 38% on year to KRW13.012 trillion, while operating profit fell 6.0% on year to KRW1.248 trillion.

Write to Kwanwoo Jun at kwanwoo.jun@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 24, 2019 04:31 ET (08:31 GMT)
